description.content:
Expert WIX STUDIO and WIX STANDARD EDITOR designer and developer..

75% of consumers judge company credibility based on their website design.

Over 85% of people will visit your site in their decision-making journey.

57% say they wont recommend a business with a poorly designed mobile site.

88% are less likely to return to a site after a bad experience.

Moral of the story? If you are serious about your business, you need a website built by an expert!


About Me:

  • #1 Australian & APAC WiX Partner Agency
  • Top 4 Global WiX Partner Agency, 
  • Legend WiX Studio Partner


I have developed over 800 WiX sites, all perfectly designed around the clients' business, brand, customers, and goals. 


What You Get...

100% on brand, customized WiX website 

100% Mobile Friendly & SEO Friendly

Video tutorial recorded on your finished website

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you migrate my site form another platform to WIX?
questionsAndAnswers.answer:
While we cannot 'migrate' a website to WiX, we can design a  new website and bring over your;

- Contacts

- Blogs

- Safely Migrate SEO

Just select the Gig "migrate a website to WiX" or add it as an optional extra on this Gig

questionsAndAnswers.question: Wordpress or WiX?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Both Wordpress and WiX are robust solutions. Wordpress is more technical and very difficult to edit without a developer. For very customized functionality, Wordpress is best. Few businesses need this, so WiX is perfect and allows more control from business owners.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What functionality restrictions does WIX have?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: WiX has come a long way in recent years, we find for majority of our clients, their functionality requests can be achieved. When it cannot, we will find the best solution, whether it is Wordpress, Shopify or work-arounds.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Does WiX have SEO issues?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: It's an old wives tale...created by the plethora of WordPress developers losing business to WiX.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do you need to start the project?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: We have a new client onboarding form where you can share with us everything from your business taglines, competitors, target market, website references, etc. We create a Google Drive share folder so you can upload your media assets like logo's, image, videos, digital downloads, as well as content.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How do I give feedback during the website design process?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: We use a feedback editor tool, so you can click on sections of the website and leave feedback directly on the site.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is if don't have all the content ready?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: We allow 3 business days for delivery of content from project kickoff.  If the content is not received we will use placement text and images (dummy) throughout the site. The video tutorial will explain how you can change this easily after site handover.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you offer help and support after the site is finished?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: We provide free 1 month bug fixing after site handover. We offer managed services for website maintenance, updates, changes, etc, on either retainer model or by hourly rates.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you offer SEO?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: We include basic SEO in every website design service. For advanced SEO we will advise you before the project so you can make informed decisions about your site development. We offer retainer model SEO packages for ongoing works.

reviews.comment: Nicole has been exceptional throughout the entire process. Responsive, collaborative and nothing is ever too much trouble. Her professionalism and expertise are of the highest standard. We’ll be engaging her again in the future and would recommend her to any business looking to create a professional website.
Good communication, fast response, very professional.

Many thanks, Nicole, for the fabulous author website you created for me! You understood my work brief and the end result exceeded my expectations. Your professional approach to your work, timely delivery, and proactive communication is a credit to you.

seller_response.comment: Thank you for your kind review Vanda!

reviews.comment: it was great working with Nicole. She really helped us to create a unique website for our new project. Thank youè

Right from the start, Nicole was extremely professional, efficient and very competent. She quickly recognized the problems and challenges and was able to solve everything professionally and within a very short time. She always answered very quickly and worked through the problems and also accepted improvement requests and implemented them very quickly and well. I am completely satisfied with the result and will be very happy to work with Nicole again in the future.

She was a great resource and support for this project and knew all the relevant areas and was able to solve all problems very quickly and independently bring in and suggest suggestions for optimization.
